channel.title: What do you expect?
channel.description:
Greetings,
I have been thinking about this for a while. When I download someones released source, I expect AT LEAST the following:
Fully functional player saving. Doors are not a pain to add, (dementhium handles this VERY well) Combat is done. It has all its packet handlers. Contains no custom items or locations.
What do y'all expect a released server to have at least?

item.title: What do you expect?
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

Wintercanon:

Your conditions sound suitable if you want to leech and host someone else’s work.

I know I do leech, but I have never released any source claiming its mine or ever hosted one.

Read full topic
